means: 巴比伦，奢华淫靡的城市，任何大的富庶的或罪恶的城市

sentence.Network_en: There they remained until Cyrus took Babylon ( 538 BC ).
sentence.Network_cn: 他们一直留在那里,直到居留士攻占巴比伦 ( 公元前538年 ).

sentence.Network_en: Probably this literature was first put together in Babylon.
sentence.Network_cn: 很可能这部文献最早是在巴比伦汇总起来的.

sentence.Network_en: Babylon was financially far ahead of Egypt.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴比伦在金融方面远远领先于埃及.
